environment_variables.dvc_stage_name: A string passed as the first argument to the script
environment_variables.SLURM_PROCID: The process ID of the current SLURM task
environment_variables.SLURM_JOB_NAME: The name of the SLURM job
environment_variables.slurm_stage_env: An optional string containing environment variables for the stage
environment_variables.dvc_stage_outs: An array of output paths for the DVC stage
